alert.note: Alert for Anson; Montgomery; Moore; Richmond (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 11 at 4:03PM EST by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Moore, east central Anson, Montgomery and northwestern Richmond Counties through 430 PM EST... At 403 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles southwest of Troy to 8 miles east of Ansonville to 7 miles east of Wadesboro. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Troy, Biscoe, Mount Gilead, Ellerbe, Star, Candor, Norman, Uwharrie Haven, Blewett Falls Lake and Derby. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
